name: Red Guy Chronicles 2
description:
Red Guy Chronicles 2

There are tons of bad guys, and you as red guy will take them all out

Controls:

"W" = Jump

"A" = Move left

"S" = Move Down

"D" = Move Right

You can also double jump!

There are 3 main enemies and one boss

There is a purple guy, and flying orange guy, and a snake.

There is also Gems around the map so try to find all of them!!

Also look out for a Easter egg 😉
